lead_paragraph: The New York Yankees will release Alex Rodriguez, one of the greatest players of his generation and one of baseball's most polarizing figures, with his final game with the club set for Friday.

headline.print_headline: New York Yankees to Release Alex Rodriguez, Last Game on Friday
headline.main: New York Yankees to Release Alex Rodriguez, Last Game on Friday
